errors.coreFieldMissing: Core field missing : {{name}}. Please implement this field.
errors.dataFieldDuplicated: Data name duplicated : {{name}}. Please provide different value names for all questions.
errors.duplicatedGraphQLTypeName: A form or a reference data with a similar name already exists. Please provide a different name.
errors.formResDuplicated: A form or a resource with that name already exists.
errors.groupsFromServiceDisabled: Fetching groups from service not available.
errors.groupsManualCreationDisabled: Manual creation of groups is disabled.
errors.incrementalIdError: Error with the incremental ID for records
errors.invalidAddApplicationName: The name can only consist of alphanumeric characters. Please choose a different name.
errors.invalidAddFormArguments: Form should either correspond to a new resource or existing resource.
errors.invalidAddPageArguments: Page type must be an available type and linked application ID must be provided.
errors.invalidAddStepArguments: Step type must be an available type and linked workflow ID must be provided.
errors.invalidAggregation: Error with the aggregation format passed, missing a core parameter such as dataSource, pipeline, etc.
errors.invalidCORS: The CORS policy for this site does not allow access from the specified Origin.
errors.invalidConversion: Cannot convert this record to this target form type.
errors.invalidCustomStage: Custom stage cannot be parsed correctly.
errors.invalidEditApiConfigurationArguments: Either name, status, authType, endpoint, pingUrl, settings or permissions must be provided.
errors.invalidEditApplicationArguments: Either name, status, pages, settings or permissions must be provided.
errors.invalidEditDashboardArguments: Either name or structure must be provided.
errors.invalidEditPageArguments: Either name or permissions must be provided.
errors.invalidEditRecordArguments: Either data or version must be provided.
errors.invalidEditReferenceDataArguments: Either name, type, apiConfiguration, query, fields, valueField, path, data or permissions must be provided.
errors.invalidEditResourceArguments: Either fields or permissions must be provided.
errors.invalidEditRolesArguments: Either permissions or channels must be provided.
errors.invalidEditSettingArguments: At least userManagement must be provided.
errors.invalidEditStepArguments: Either name, type, content or permissions must be provided.
errors.invalidEditUserArguments: Either groups or roles must be provided.
errors.invalidEditWorkflowArguments: Either name or steps must be provided.
errors.invalidEmailsInput: Wrong format detected. Please provide valid emails.
errors.invalidFieldName: The name of the field {{field}} is invalid: {{err}}
errors.invalidGraphQLTypeName: The name can only consist of alphanumeric characters. Please choose a different name.
errors.invalidPublishNotificationArguments: Action, content and channel arguments must all be provided.
errors.invalidUserUpload: Please provide email and role for each user.
errors.missingDataField: Please add a value name to all questions, inside Data tab.
errors.missingRelatedField: Please add a related name to {{name}} question.
errors.pageTypeError: The page passed in argument is not a workflow type.
errors.relatedNameDuplicated: Related name duplicated : {{name}}. The target Resource already contains a field with that name. Please provide a different name.
errors.resourceDuplicated: An existing resource with that name already exists.
errors.usageOfProtectedName: This name is protected and cannot be used. Please choose a different name.
errors.wrongTemplateProvided: Template must sharing the same resource as the parent form of the edited record.
